mapper.select: select email as mail,name as name,count(*) as cnt from (select mem_email as email, mem_name as name, log_data as data from log_data,member where log_data.mem_no = member.mem_no)group by email,name
mapper.update: update company set com_pwd=#{com_pwd} where com_no=#{com_no}
mapper.select: select member.mem_no as mno, member.mem_email as memail,member.mem_name as mname,grade.gra_kind as gra,grade.gra_no as grano from member left join grade on grade.mem_no=member.mem_no where member.com_no=#{com_no}

select member.mem_no as mno, member.mem_email as memail, member.mem_name as mname, member.mem_date as mdate,member.com_no as comno,grade.gra_kind as gra,grade.gra_no as grano from member left join grade on grade.mem_no=member.mem_no where member.mem_no = #{mem_no}

select member.mem_email as memail,member.mem_name as mname,a.file_name as fname,a.log_file_downdate as fdowndate,a.file_size as fsize from member, (select log_file.log_file_no,log_file.mem_no, log_file.log_file_downdate, files.file_name, files.file_size from log_file left join files on log_file.file_no = files.file_no)a where member.mem_no = a.mem_no
select project.pro_no as pno,pro_name as pname,pro_date as pdate from project left join company_project on project.pro_no=company_project.pro_no where company_project.com_no=#{com_no}

select project_user.mem_no as mno,member.mem_email as memail,member.mem_name as mname,pro_no as pno,pro_user_man_chk as manchk from project_user left join member on project_user.mem_no = member.mem_no where pro_no=#{pro_no}
select pro_no as pno,pro_name as pname from project where pro_no=#{pro_no}
